website_summaries.verdict: The RemoBell by Olive & Dove is only worth it if you have strong preference for a AA-powered buzzer.
pros: Olive & Dove's $199 RemoBell is powered by easy-to-find AA batteries, which makes installation simple and wire-free
cons: It doesn't have live video streaming or any third-party smart home partners

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this product after reading the reviews. Save your money. This is by far the worst thing I have ever bought. After drilling holes on my newly painted front door, the mount was damaged. It took me several tries to download the app and link it to my wifi. The unit is not descreet as it looks in the picture, it big. There is a delay in the video, there is one way sound. By the way, there is a card enclosed in the package. The manufacturer offers a gift if you write a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Rulla H.

customer_reviews.title: No bell Now I tried to replace the batteries. I unscrewed the tiny screw then all 4 plastic brackets broke off.
customer_reviews.text: There is now bell sound in the house, so if you don't have your phone with you, you don't know when someone is at the door. There should be an option to buy a bell or buzzer that wifi's with the unit
customer_reviews.author: Mark R spelman

customer_reviews.title: Paid for shiny and new; received dirty and used.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, but it's clearly used. There's crusty stuff on the sides, abrasions on the front, the batteries are dead, the battery cover's screw is slightly stripped, and I'm pretty sure it hadn't even been reset. So someone probably got a good look at my apartment before I reset it myself. Returning, because I paid for a new device, and this is just creepy.
customer_reviews.author: El Beh

customer_reviews.title: This is really pretty cool. The reason I don't give it 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really pretty cool. The reason I don't give it 5 stars is because it eats 6 AA batteries every 2 weeks! I bought a transformer and wired it into that since I was going broke buying batteries. If it wasn't for that, I'd definitely give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Customer Service from RemoBell
customer_reviews.text: I gave it one star for the RemoBell poor customer service. I had what I thought a minor issue and should be easy to fix. Called customer service the first time, received a recording, gave my name and number but no one returned call. Called a second time, got a young lady who could not help me with my problem. She said she would call back after she talked to a fellow employee but never called back. So I'm returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that you need to replace/recharge the batteries after three days. Just to screw the tiny screw that holds the bell in place its a pain in the behind imagine doing that every three days. Not t worth it. I installed a camera and now I can see who’s at the door knocking or not. So bottom line I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Luzy T

customer_reviews.title: Slow reaction time.
customer_reviews.text: Video quality is very clear. Biggest problem I found is the delay in starting to record from the time it senses movement. The mailman walks up to the front porch picks up the packages and it starts to record when he is get back to his truck. Kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: started out good but it's not now
customer_reviews.text: I have had this doorbell for one month plus 3 days. It consistently picked up every car that passed by the house. That ran the batteries down. We have charged the original, replaced with other rechargeable and even tried normal batteries and it still shows only partial charge and is not working now, even the doorbell won't ring. I'd like to get my money back on this.
customer_reviews.author: angelwanab

customer_reviews.title: Got this video doorbell due to bad neighborhood. Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Got this video doorbell due to bad neighborhood. Easy installation. AWSOME product! Had to contact customer support for cloud service. Great experience talking to them. They took care of the issues, stress free.. I'm very happy I chose RemoBell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Need one for my back door.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Video and voice is clear. You can hear and talk from both ends. Super easy to install I did it myself. I live alone in my apartment and being alone is kind of sketchy especially when you hear noises outside at night and have no clue what's going on. When someone passes or rings the bell (pushes the button) it notifies you within 3-5seconds on your smartphone. It came with 6 rechargeable batteries, which is awesome. It is very safe and secure on the wall outside. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's good value for the money. 2 constructive suggestions- 1).The door mount plastic is a bit filmy you can easily pull the unit off from the door. A more robust metal bracket is needed. 2). The size of the unit is a bit big and thick. A thinner/smaller design would be better. The product came with rechargeable batteries with no charger. You were urged to review the product before they send you the charger. How the hell would you review the product with dead batteries? This is a very bad PR poise.
customer_reviews.author: Kai H Mui

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. I have a Ring and this is more sensitive to motion than Ring. I only wish there was something to hold it in place cause it looks like anybody can just grab it and take it. But the sensor is awesome, Once my motion sensor went off on my cell phone and I looked outside but nobody was there and I watched the video later and it picked up a spider walking over the RemoBell!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LETICIA VALLEJO

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a truly wireless wifi doorbell cam and I think that I may have found it with the RemoBell with one exception. I've had it now for a few day and so far so good. My one complaint so far is that it does not push the doorbell rings directly to my phone, this feature works intermittently and it is kind of a deal breaker if I can't get it to work as promised. I will try it a few more days and see if it is something I can fix or live with.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Koch

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Security in one.
customer_reviews.text: We love the RemoBell. It is a nice technology to have. We really like that it not only has camera for those who ring the bell, but also gives video and alert for motion as well. We are alerted as soon as anyone comes to our front door and have a video to see even if they dont actually push the button. We also like that a video is created for each occurence and saved automatically. The company was excellent to deal with and super speedy shippping. Thank you for the fun and extra security! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kristin44774

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this since I do not have power at my front door and liked the added feature of the video. This has been the most troubling device I have purchased. It's hard to get it setup and not very user friend Cons: Batteries don't last that long and the screw that secures it is really small and can get lost. It always have connective issues even though I get a good signal with my phone wifi at the location False motion No noise inside house when someone rings the bell Picks up people when they are already entered, so you can hear them but not see them
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doorbell because it used batteries, as I would install it where there were no wires from previous doorbell. First one received, did not work, so called service. That person was very helpful. A new one was sent to me right away. Easy to install. Problem was batteries needed changing every 3-4 days, possibly because it was cold outside? These are rechargable, so purchased a second set and recharged one set while the other was in the doorbell. When I needed to change my router password, Remo would not accept the change. After numerous tries, including resetting the device and starting install from the beginning, it failed. Today, it was tossed in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is great, recharging about once a month without problems
customer_reviews.text: For those who cant wire-in a wireless cam/doorbell, this is the product for you. Battery life is great, recharging about once a month without problems. The primary con is the inability to view a live feed at will. The button has to be pressed to get a life- feed, and you have to pay for the cloud service to view recording's of motion detected, w/o the service you just get a notification without video. Overall a good product but its the service you have to buy-into that brings it down.
customer_reviews.author: Lost LT.

customer_reviews.title: love the product
customer_reviews.text: love the product, can view people at our front door from anywhere in the world. And, have a conversation with them too!!! Simply amazing..!!! The Hogan's
customer_reviews.author: Shacky Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The way the sun is to my front porch, the persons face is dark and not able to identify that person. The anchor plate is also cheap and barely holds the doorbell on, and in 2 days up the battery was already down to 60%, I did fully charge them before installing.
customer_reviews.author: ladymccoy

customer_reviews.title: Positioning the device for good coverage of the front door area was easy
customer_reviews.text: I did the install myself, without difficulty. Positioning the device for good coverage of the front door area was easy. The actual install was simple, and once mounted it is quite secure. I am sure someone could rip it off the wall, but that is always a possibility no matter how secure. The set up was easy, the app. easy to use, and once I learned how to use my own phone(lol) the pairing and wifi connection was easy as well. The imaging is quite good set at average, more than adequate for ID of someone at the door. I would buy this item again .
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Cook

customer_reviews.title: Stay AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Product is terrible, battery life is non-existent. I would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: MTM

customer_reviews.title: are poor and slow
customer_reviews.text: Not yet developed to meet standards. Video, audio, delay, battery life, etc. are poor and slow. trying to return this item but having difficulty. Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't Wait to Use It
customer_reviews.text: Just received my RemoBell yesterday, and already love it. It took about 2 minutes to get the iphone app linked to the RemoBell, and the audio and video have been great. I have zero capability when it comes to working with tools, but I was able to mount the bracket and unit to my door frame in about 20 minutes. I really like the fact that the app allows me to see the battery level, and I can adjust the sound and picture quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this Remobell over a year. Easy to install, set up, no maintenance after initial set-up except replacing the batteries. Very satisfied with all the products from Remo+ including Remocam. I was considering buying another Remobell and actually ended up with the newly launched DoorCam having a "Over the Door" design distinguished from all other "attachable" doorbells. Better to take a look at the new Doorcam (I linked)
customer_reviews.author: Hank Lee

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money starts recording when the person is already ...
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money starts recording when the person is already walking away also picks up false movements and only comes with a 30 day free trial once it's up you have to pay to have it monthly. The mounting bracket is a piece of crap someone can easily rip it off the bracket and walk off with your 200 dollar device. Just all around very very disappointed in this product!!! I highly recommend DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME!!!
customer_reviews.author: Geremy Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This product works ok as long as you get the yearly cloud storage. The main flaw is that the batteries only last 3-4 days unless you don’t use any motion sensor. Even on low setting it still is triggered by every squirrel, blowing leaf and tree bough in the wind. All which use the 4 batteries up quickly. We wanted to return it and the company that sells it didn’t bother to respond to our request in two days Amazon told us we could then file a claim but that page “couldn’t be found”. We”re stuck using it just as a doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeps

customer_reviews.title: The battery-operated RemoBell was the best solution for us since we had no preexisting wiring ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery-operated RemoBell was the best solution for us since we had no preexisting wiring in place for a doorbell, and are located fairly remotely with a definite need for visual surveillance. The RemoBell has solved our problems fantastically. Installation and programming was a breeze, and functionality has been problem-free! Motion-sensing, daytime video capture, as well as night-time low light capture has been excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It was less expensive than the competitor and seems to be working better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to see if it would help me monitor my gate activity for my dog boarding business. It was less expensive than the competitor and seems to be working better than I expected. i would have given it five stars but the mounting bracket is plastic and one of the clips has already broken. You have to take the unit off of the mounting bracket to replace the batteries and therefore has to be off and on the plastic clips frequently. If they can improve this part of the product no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Monte

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed but overall it's good that I get alerts when ...
customer_reviews.text: The sensory is not alert until someone is at the door. I thought it would alert when they are close by or around. And the recording only lasted 1 minutes, was hoping that it continue to record until they are away from the property. A little disappointed but overall it's good that I get alerts when someone at my door.
customer_reviews.author: Rida

customer_reviews.title: Recommended RemoBell to my neighbor
customer_reviews.text: Have had the RemoBell for months. Recommended RemoBell to my neighbor. Systems works good. Would like to have a remote chime for inside the house when some one at the door. I think Remo is coming out with one soon.I would like to see Remo come up with a small monitor for inside the house. Many of my senior friends don't have smart phones. A small monitor hooked up to the RemoBell could work the same as a Smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Drdonwalah

customer_reviews.title: As described and great value
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the other video doorbell systems that require a monthly subscription, the RemoBell is a much better value if you opt to use it without storing video. For a one-time cost, you have a video & 2-way audio doorbell that temporarily saves your recordings and has motion sensor that you can turn on/off. It installed quickly and easily, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: ABCD

customer_reviews.title: It is battery power and will stop working
customer_reviews.text: Ok with installation it is DIY FRIENDLY. Just be careful when setting it in place on the hooks. You also have to get a subscription to view the video,if you get a notification. Which is good for 1 year. I have a couple of other issues. It’s very sensitive a school bus or trash truck or even a small car it will pick it up. It doesn’t come with the extra chime so you can hear it when your just home and away from your phone. It battery power, so if temperature are really cold, it will stop working until it warm up. Even if you put in battery in it
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort for our Family
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! We bought it to keep an eye on my latch key child when he goes back to school and since our original door bell was broken, it's been a great feature when we have visitors! Its nice to have the app on my phone and I can talk to them over the phone without leaving my seat! It has a great camera range and we love how much you can view on the camera! It also have a great feature where you can adjust how much motion it detects outside.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia C Voltz

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing :-(
customer_reviews.text: The RemoBell is a poor copy of the Ring doorbell. First they charge to make and save the videos. They don’t give you the option to save them somewhere else. We had it installed about 3 weeks and it rained. Water got inside and it didn’t work anymore! I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up and install
customer_reviews.text: This product received 4 stars only because when it arrived it came with 6 rechargeable batteries and no battery charger. So if you do not have a battery charger handy you will have to go buy one to complete the install of your new RemoBell. It was easy to set up and install. Would recommend and advise to get a battery charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was very easy to install and configure and has the added flexibility ...
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install and configure and has the added flexibility and advantage of wireless connection and access through the smartphones and tablets in the house. I can find out who is at the door from anywhere in the house and other people at home can do same too. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Orji

customer_reviews.title: Remote bell helps with security
customer_reviews.text: The device works as,advertised and we have been successful in monitoring traffic near our door. The one shortcoming is the lag from motion to recording in some cases. Other than that it has been a stellar unit. Since we installed it we have not had anymore items removed from the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless video doorbell but no smarthome support.
customer_reviews.text: RemoBell is an all-around solid choice for a wireless video smart doorbell. It functions with the homegrown app on your tablet or smartphone. No need for existing doorbell wiring. Just screw in/attach and connect to your wi-fi. This device is sorely missing functionality to connect to other smart devices such as Amazon Echo.
customer_reviews.author: John Spisiak

customer_reviews.title: ... had my RemoBell a few days but already I like it. I live alone and it will help ...
customer_reviews.text: I've just had my RemoBell a few days but already I like it. I live alone and it will help me feel secure when people I don't know come to my door. Looking forward to really love having it. I would really like to have the free battery charger you offer.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: great device for urban living
customer_reviews.text: It has given us peace of mind like never before. Everyone in the family has the app so they know if they should answer the door or be alerted to strange behaviors. The motion sensor has also cut down having packages disappearing off our porch.
customer_reviews.author: bondboy42

customer_reviews.title: They already love it. Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this for my parents. They already love it. Easy set up. Alerts to their phones, they can see who is at the door. It was the perfect gift for them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kobrin

customer_reviews.title: After 2 attempts, I'm switching brands.
customer_reviews.text: Returned the first one because it would not turn on at all. The replacement worked perfectly for about 4 days, then refused to connect to my Wi-Fi. Returning it and switching brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Holt

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: We've had this doorbell since July and have had nothing but problems. It chewed its way through batteries, we tried regular and rechargeable and they would run out after just a few days, and now finally has stopped working completely. Olive and Dove has said they'll refund us, so we'll be getting one from somewhere else, which is probably what we should have done in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Bregs

customer_reviews.title: This model is nice and better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: This model is nice and better than nothing, but for 50% more the RING 2 is utterly superior and worth every extra penny. The RemoBell has poor video, unintelligible audio, doen't allow LIVE VIEW and chews through batteries if you make the motion sensor do its job. I went thru 2 of these before I bought the RING 2 - I wound up wasting my time.
customer_reviews.author: Professor MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Limited activity.
customer_reviews.text: Setup was a bit of a problem with website and Wi-Fi. Finally accomplished that and system worked fine for a couple days with motion working. Now it's not working unless the button is pressed and there is no notifications at all. Will try to work out bugs but not very happy at this point!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The initial wifi connection hasn't been popping up easily, and we hope to connect the doorbell to ...
customer_reviews.text: We are so excited to have this wireless doorbell! Our only minor frustration is that we are having difficulty with multiple phones connecting to the app. The initial wifi connection hasn't been popping up easily, and we hope to connect the doorbell to multiple phones. Hopefully once we work out this kink it will be five-star!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this doorbell! The video clarity is excellent and the audio is loud and clear. The best part is knowing someone is at my door even when I'm not home. I wish it had a door chime for inside the house (for when I'm doing laundry, cleaning, etc and don't have my phone in hand) but other than that, I love this product and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable batteries are HORRIBLE; Video never begins recording as a person approaches
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews and for the price, I thought this would be a really well-made product, but it's horrible. It comes with rechargable batteries which lasted about a month. I charged all of them, put them back in the doorbell, and they lasted maybe 4 days before I got a notification that the batterues needed to be charged again. So, I recharged them. And they lasted a day. Aside from the battery issue, every video recording catches the very end of whomever coming through the door and never catches anybody approaching the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: I really like the RemoBell
customer_reviews.text: I really like the RemoBell. I like that it is so easy to install and maintain since it is battery only and the batteries last a very long time.. It has great video and audio quality. I enjoy knowing who is coming onto my porch and having the option to speak to a visitor or just observe, from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Donna

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. We did need to provide an additional screw to put on the door casing. Our month free trial has ended and now we will have to join the monthly fee to see video of the door after the initial alert. We checked the price and it’s the same as Ring. So we are going to stay with remo
customer_reviews.author: allison mayo

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This product and the remo+ DoorCam work great! I purchased the doorbell first, and then the DoorCam as soon as it was available. I had a little trouble setting it up initially, but customer service was excellent and walked me through everything until I figured out what I was doing wrong. The quality is excellent on both products and I highly recommend both.
customer_reviews.author: wlfour

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: RemoBell was a very easy setup after downloading app, connecting to wireless network and then mechanical install. Image quality really good. Used a handful of times before and after installing and only issue I have now is that it's taking some time to link to my phone after bell is run. Overall really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This device is easy to install and use, works great at our front gate and saves me from making needless trips downstairs to the front door. Additionally I can view videos of motion that occurred throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL L WALLACE

customer_reviews.title: RemoBell
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!!! Haven't figured out the audio yet but loving the part where I can see anyone walking up on the porch. UPS came by, didn't even ring the door bell but the motion capture him . I will be buying one for my daughter and I'm telling everyone else about it. I believe it's a good thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: ... have an additional safety feature and it has worked great. Being able to see who is at the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to have an additional safety feature and it has worked great. Being able to see who is at the door no matter where you are provides peace of mind. I also like that you are able to talk to whoever is outside if needed and have a snap shot captured and saved. would highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so excited to have such an amazing doorbell that I can actually see who's there and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to have such an amazing doorbell that I can actually see who's there and talk to them without even being home. I like how it has the motion sensor and how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Barros

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works great for us, at first it was reporting motions all the time but I changed the settings (we live on a very busy street) and it works perfectly, letting me know if someone is at our front door. The only thing I have not figured out is how to make it make a sound on my phone when someone rings the bell, but I think that is a phone issue and not their app.
customer_reviews.author: LAG

customer_reviews.title: Great doorbell needs chime
customer_reviews.text: This Remo doorbell is great. Only reason not 5 stars is there is no Remo Chime for the inside. So if I have my notifications low or off, I may not hear if anyone is at the door.
customer_reviews.author: D. Powell

customer_reviews.title: The good & the bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice doorbell camera, good resolution, easy to install, cheaper (but bigger) than the other brand. It’s a flaw that you can’t view from the camera anytime you want. Someone has to ring the doorbell or activate the motion detector. Also, you can’t record the image if the motion detector goes off unless you pay a monthly fee. Thus, you can only record on your phone (for free) if someone rings the doorbell. What thief is going to ring the doorbell?
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I works as well as I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it for 3 days so far. and it is great. the motion detector picks up the garbage truck when it passes by. so I like its range. they say the first month of cloud service is free. I am curious to know how it performs without the cloud service. but that is about 40$ per year.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Adams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent security device
customer_reviews.text: We have had the remobell installed for two months now. It gives us a better sense of security knowing we can see (and record) who is at our door. We have already experienced notification of a package being delivered while we were on vacation 50 miles from home. We then called our neighbors who retrieved the package just before a big storm moved through our area. Great product, well built and easy to install and program with our WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Camera is great!
customer_reviews.text: RemoBell has helped so much in keeping an eye on my front door. We have had a plant thief stealing off our porch and others on our street, so I am trusting that if they come back we will capture them on video. The camera is great in daylight and at night. Not so great is: There is a slow response time (my mailman gets picked up on video as he is walking away). Also, the microphone is not very clear. Overall though I like it.
customer_reviews.author: bgf

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to install on grandmothers house so she could see who was there without having to get up. Seems to work ok, it was a little too sensitive at first. For example after I installed it and left...the batteries were dead the next day because she had over 150 alerts on her ipad...one for every car that drove by in the neighborhood. Ended up turning the alerts off completely and works for a video doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: it was brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: It works intermittently, not sure if this is because of my wifi connection (which drops frequently) -but it takes a long time to connect - which people would surely have left before you answer. When it worked, it was brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Winegirl

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: By far the simplest setup I have ever experienced for a product. This bell has everything I expected and more from a security device of its kind. The app on your mobile device keeps a record of the activity once the bell is activated. Within that record is your entire video session including audio as well. I am very impressed with this item and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Schneeberg

customer_reviews.title: My new front doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a stellar product. Like the low light image processing.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Trough

customer_reviews.title: love seeing who or what is at my door even ...
customer_reviews.text: love seeing who or what is at my door even when I'm gone. Only negative is its a little slow. But its just because it has to go through the WiFi. Makes you feel much more secure. Thanks Remo
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: I would recomend this item, it works wellj
customer_reviews.text: Works well, very sensitive, app lacks bulk editing but overall works ok. I use it at my rear door with lots of sidewalk traffic and it works well night and day. Battery life seams good and are rechargeable however no charger comes with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B

customer_reviews.title: Hassle
customer_reviews.text: This item is a hassle. You have to keep charging it
customer_reviews.author: yem ray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install

product_meta.title: RemoBell WiFi Video Doorbell (Battery Powered, Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, HD Video, Motion Sensor) (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver

RemoBell is a battery powered, Wi-Fi, wireless video doorbell that lets you answer your door from anywhere using the RemoBell app. The video doorbell syncs to the mobile app, and enables you to see and communicate with your visitors from your smartphone. When a visitor is at your door, RemoBell will send you a push notification and live video feed. You can see and communicate with your visitors, watch recorded videos, be alerted when someone is at your door, and see recent activity from the RemoBell app. Our wireless doorbell brings you the security and convenience you've been looking for. Revolutionize your doorway with RemoBell, our camera doorbell. 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
